date: "12/4/2020"
output: html_document

In this changelog any changes to the raw data file are recorded, as per communications with the data provider (Natalie Mahara, UBC). 

The following species names were changed in the raw data input file:

Siphonophore spp. --> Siphonophorae
Clio pyrimata --> Clio pyramidata
Ptereotrachea sp. --> Carinaria japonica
Nematocelis difficilis --> Nematoscelis difficilis
Pseudosagitta scrippsae --> Pseudosagitta lyra (the former is not an accepted version under WoRMS)
Sergestes simils --> Eusergestes similis (the former is not an accepted version under WoRMS)
